comment: Ha ha. You're so wrong. If by "most don't hate other races" you mean conservatives, rightists and even pro-white advocates in general then I agree. If you mean those on Gab - then this entire poll is an argument against you. ) Read my post ) Read replies ) Assess a simple ratio of people replying to this poll that are defending hatred as a valid approach to pro-white endeavors. ) Reply and tell me what you find. My message is clear. Hatred isn't helping. Don't conflate pro-white with hateful of others. It's such a bad strategy that I suspect many many shills.
